snippet: The police said two parents of a Poly Prep student were arrested at their house in Queens where teenagers were drinking alcohol.
abstract: Police arrest Anthony and Claire E Reyes and charge them with providing alcohol to minors at a raucous party in their Breezy Point, Queens, home.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and SARAH MASLIN NIR
byline.contributor: Jenny Anderson and Joseph Goldstein contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The police said two parents of a Poly Prep student were arrested at their house in Queens where teenagers were drinking alcohol.

headline.seo: Breezy Point Couple Arrested at Party Where Minors Were Drinking
headline.main: Queens Parents’ Arrest Calls Attention to Under-Age Drinking
headline.print_headline: Drinking Party Leads to Arrest of Parents
